string.value:
EasyBCD Community Edition is 100% free software, and we intend to keep it that way. But just because it's free doesn't mean that it costs any less to develop and test.
To date, EasyBCD has been downloaded free of charge over 25 million times, saving countless computers from the brink of destruction.
你会帮助EasyBCD拯救更多的PC吗?
